string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Time for a walk! Your steps goal is just around the corner.
Relax and breathe deeply. Your heart rate seems a bit high.
Feeling too relaxed? A quick walk might help boost energy!
Keep moving! Try to burn a few more calories today.
Sync Data from SmartWatch App for better heartbeat monitoring
Great job today! Keep up the good work and stay active!
Set your Steps Goal for a day
